div.p:
day of the moneth' of Julij the yer' of god et cetera lxx yeris the aldirman
and consaile of the burgh' of Aberdene wele and riply avysit deliuerys decretis and
gr to Johne' of fyfe burges of the burgh' of abirdene and til his airis all fredo
mys that the saide Johne' has occupijt of all tymys befor' of saynt mary magdelannis
altar' steddit in the paris' kirk of saynt nicholace of the saide burgh' of abirdene and all the
inhourmentis that the saide Johne' of fyfe has brocht or purchest in his tyme to the saide
altar' sall ramayn in the keping with of the saide Johne' of fyfe his airis and thair' chaplayn
And on the samyn wys' quhat that Androw alanson bringis or giffis in the inhourment to
the sayde altar' sall ramayn at the keping of the saide Androw and his airis and thair' chaplayn
nis and sua that euery man that giffis inhourment or feftment to the saide altar' sal be
maystiris and patrownis of thair' awin gift Item the saide aldirman and consale has ordanit
in the fest of saynt mayry magdelayne that Johne' of fyffis chaplayn and Androw
alansonis chaplayn sall pass' to giddir' to the procuracione of that day and quhat that thai
get to be spendit with bath' thair' avys' to inhourment of the saide altar'

Introitus nauis copin symunde In the fyrst l barellis of appillis

Item vij barellis of vnyownis
Item ij lastis of beir'
Item viij barellis of peis'
Item iij tone' of wyne
Item ij pipis of wyne

Adrian of bonny maystir of the busche callit the antone' of bonny fyrst
xiiij last of beir'
Item xxiiij hamburgh barellis of ber'

mensis nouembris anno Domini et cetera lxvijo

burgi pro anno sequenti videlicet

The samyn day the aldirman bailyeis and hale consale h
to content and pay to Johne' the
and hurt he has sustenyt
quhethir he haf a w

Curia gilde tenta per alexandrum de camera prepositum xxmo die mensis nouembris
anno Dominj et cetera lxvijo

The samyn' day the aldirman and the hale counsale has ordanyt henry of
Kingorne' to bring a certyficacione of edinburgh' that Dauy hervyis
quartar of the schip callit the mayry is salde be the deliuerans of the law for his
propir det within xl dayis her' eftir he is quyt of the wrangwis' selling of the
saide quartar and gif he bringis nocht that certyficacione within the saide
xl dayis he is fundin that he has wrangwisly salde the saide quartar
of the said' schip pertenande to the said' Dauy hervy and to mak him de
liuerans tharof within lachfull' tym' and the iij quartaris of the saide schip wrangwisly salde
on to the tym that I hafe count and reking and be fred' of all dettis be me borowit til the outred' of
the saide schip that my obligacionis lyis for'

The samyn day thir' personys vndir writtyn ar' chosine be the hale consaile
til sett our' watiris and landis for termys and for grissommys for sindry
causis that we haue ado for the quhilkis thai sall hafe a ful commission'
that is to say the aldirman Richarde of Kintor Johne' of marr' mathow
fechat Alexander blindsele and Patrik of badenache the quhilk personys
ar' sworne' to set the said' watiris and landis til sickir' personys lele and
trew but fauour' or hattrende and thar atour' the said personys sal be audi
touris of Richard' of Kintorris comptis and Johne' of scrogis comptis of the
kirke /
Statuta

In the fyrst it is statute and ordanit be the avis' of the hale counsaile
that na vnfreman be levit to saile for na siluer and gif ony colouris
thair' gudis apon' thaim or beis merchande to thaim sal pay v merkis vnfor
giffin

Item that na freman be tholit til hafe his pak or merchandis' to sell
in the cuntre vndir the samyn payne of v merkis

Item that na merchande ger' lordschip desir' to by fra thair' husband
to alow in thar' malys vndir the samyn payn

Item is is sene profitable' that all fremmyt men that bringis lyme colys or ony vthir
girnale gud pay for the mettyng of thair' awne gudis iiij d' for the chaldir
and that al fremen pay on the samyn wis' for thair' awin gudis iiij d' for
the chaldir to the mettaris

Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore
prepositure Ricardj de Kyntor de anno lxvto

Johannes Jamyson' de strabolgy ad instanciam et requestum domini comitis
de Huntle receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
pro sex marcis soluendis preposito qui prestitit solitum Juramentum et pro predicta summa
et alijs persoluendis et perimplendis dedit patricium badenaghe plegium pro se

Item cristinus litstar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
racione paterne libertatis et soluit quinque solidos in alba bursa qui prestitit solitum
Juramentum

Item gilbertus moryson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius
burgi racione paterne libertatis et soluit quinque solidos in alba bursa qui prestitit
solitum Juramentum

Item Willelmus nory receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
ex fauore consilij qui soluit quatuor marcas preposito et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Johannes Watson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
ex fauore consilij et soluit quatuor marcas preposito qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Alexander stokar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
ex fauore consilij quia disponsauit filiam liberi burgensem qui prestitit Juramentum
solitum

Robertus de buchan receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
pro tribus libris soluendis preposito et ex fauore consilij quia disponsauit filiam Willelmi
coly liberj burgensis qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

head.add: subscripte sunt indictate in secreta inquiscione et conuicte

div.p:
Elyne bessat Johne' fullaris wyff is conuickyt be a sworne' assisse for a common rabellour'
and namely of Johne' of tulydeff officiar' and for a common ressettar' of gude menys gudis
and a common browstar' and caike baxtar and sellar' and scho vnfre / and the saide assise ordanit
the saide elyne til mak a sufficiande amendis to Johne' of tulydeff for the sclandir' and ra
belling scho dide til him

Penultimo die mensis Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxvijo prepositus cum quibusdam
de consilio continuauit decisionem certificacionis presentate per henricum de Kingorn'
in causa mota inter ipsum de Dauid hervy penes vendicionem quarterij vnius nauis
dicto Dauid pertinenter continua vt asseruit cum consensu parcium propter debilitatem consilij tunc non
presentis vsque ad proximam curiam gilde post curiam capitalem tentam post festum natalis Domini sine
preiudicio alicuius pertinenciis et tunc dicta certificacio decidetur per prepositum et consilium peremptorie et sine
vlteriori dilacione /

add.foreign: Copia littere directe domino de forbes per consilium et communitate huius burgi

div.p:
Richt honorable' and michty lorde we commawnde ws hartly on to your' lordschip and
pleysit your' lordschip to wit that we hafe ressauyt a letter of youris fra your' chaplayn
this last twysday and quhar' your' lorschip writis til ws that certan personys of our' burgh'
is cummyn in contrar' of your' lordschip in feir' of werr' and as your' lordschip presumys that
thai passit nocht without avys' and consaile of ws we declar' to your' lordschip that we war'
nothir' art nor part rede nor consaile of the personys that passit in contrar' of your' lordschip nor
thinkis neid to gif rede nor consaile til ony man to do ony molestacione or grefe in contrar' of
your' lordschip bot euir to do seruice and emplesance to your' lordschip at our' gudely poweris
and quhar' your' lordschip complenyeis apon' our' aldirman that men of his hushalde was
thar' we hafe inquiryt at him tharof and his ansuer' tyll ws is this that be his wittyn thar' was na
man thar' belangande him nor his hushalde and he sayis gif it pleys' your' lordschipe
til rehers' ony mannys name of his hushalde that was thar' it sal be wele amendyt that
your' lordschip sal be empleysit // quhar' for we beseke your' lordschip richt instantly
that ye be nocht grevit nor displeysit at ws nor our' nichtburis for ony caus' done'
be ws for we think to kepe our' kindnes to your' lordschip that your' lordschip salbe
empleysit be the grace of god and traistis the samyn in your lordschip quhilkis all
mychty god conserue in langlestande honour' and prosperite writyn vndir our secret sele of
caus' the pennult day of August /
youris at thair' gudely poweris
the consaile and communite of the burgh'
of Abirdene'
Nobili et potenti domino domino
de forbes domino nostro confidenti

Till al and sindry to quhais knawlagis thir present lettres sal to cum the Aldirman bailyeis consale
and communite of the burgh of abirdene greting in god wit your' vniuersite ws avisitly til hafe
set and to ferme' lattyn and be the tenour' of thir' present lettres settis and to ferme lattis al and hale
our' landis of the kingis well with the pertinens with al and sindry fredomys profitis and aysiamentis
til our' luffit nichtbur' thomas quelp his helpis and assignays nan grettar' than him
self for the termys of nynteyne yeris fullely and continualy to be compleit and runnyne
the forsaide thomas quelp his helpis and assignays payande til ws yerely for ferme'
of the forsaide landis with the pertinens twa merkis of the vsuale payment of scotlande /
proporcionaly at twa vsuale termys of the yer' that is to say Witsonday and martymes
in wynter be ewinly porcionis / The entre of the saide thomas his helpis or assig
nays in the take of the saide landis of the kingis will with the pertinens at the fest of
Witsonday next and immediate eftir folowande the date of the making of thir' present lettres
And frathin' furth to bruk and Joys' the tak of the fornemnyt landis with the pertinens
with al fredomys profitis commoditeis and aysiamentis pertenande or may pertene to the
saide landis with the pertinens ony maner of wayis quhill the termys of nynteyne
yeris befor expremyt be fullely compleit and runnyn for the forsaide ferme yerely pay
ande til ws as forsaide is but ony interrupcione questione' or demawnde // the forsaid'
thomas his helpis and assignays haffande the forsaid' take of the landis fornemnyt
with the pertinens fre but maile payande til ws the twa first yeris of thair' entre for
the bigging of the said' landis in al gudely haste / and we the forsaid' aldirman bail
yeis consaile and communite sal warande kepe and defende al and hale the tak of the fornemnyt
landis with the pertinens to the forsaide thomas quelp his helpis and assignays nan
grettar' than him self as saide is in all forme forss' and effect befor' expremyt agayn
al dedely to the vsche of the termys of nyntene yeris befor' nemnyt lelely and trewely
but fraude or gile In witnes of the quhilk thing we hafe to appensit our' common
sele at the burgh of abirdene the xxviij day of maij the yer' of our' lorde a thousande
four' hundreth sexty and aucht yeris
